Room.Name: Jade Green Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dimly-lit green shaded hallway that appears to head down a corridor to the south. To the north is an iron gate that appears to be locked. The stench of rotting flesh is prevalent beyond the gate.
Room.LongDescription: The lime-green walls are surprisingly slick and clean. A strange mist appears to the south that obstructs your view of exactly where you're going or where the hallway leads.
